title: DERI PROTOCOL
who-uses-describe: Our ecosystem is an entity made up of a variety of essential contributors and key roles, each performing an important task.
liquidity-providers-describe: provide liquidity to collectively play the role of the counterparty for the traders.
traders-describe: use Deri Protocol to trade perpetual futures and everlasting options.
position-liquidators-describe: liquidate the positions failing to meet the maintenance margin requirement.
arbitragers-describe: balance the two sides of long and short positions induced by the arbitrage of mark-index price spread or funding fee.
step-connect-wallet-describe: Connect your wallet with one click—no sign-up or intermediaries. Deri Protocol operates on BSC/Polygon networks; fund your wallet with some BNB/MATIC to start.
step-deposit-margin-describe: Deposit margin into your account by sending in funds in one or more of the accepted tokens. Your margin fund is transparent and secure in smart contracts on the blockchain network.
step-trade-derivatives-describe: Fill out the volume and place your order to open perpetual futures and everlasting options positions. All trades are executed against our DPMM, with market depth backed by consolidated liquidity.
